pages.text: $(o) Arcana is an enigmatic energy that flows through the world. Especially high concentrations manifest as scintillating otherworldy glyphs.$()$(br) - Excerpt from $(o)On Arcana$() by Archmage Enerius Withywright

Arcana is the primary resource used by a Sorcerer. $(br2) It fuels every spell that is cast. Arcana can be generated by $(l:initiate_spells/spell_meditate)meditating$(/l) with a spellcasting implement, and by special structures known as $(l:basic_info/monoliths)monoliths$(/l).$(br2)Meditating near a monolith appears to quickly drain Arcana from the monolith into the spellcasting implement.
